amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer or enforce any of the rules proposed in the Notice of Proposed Rulemaking adopted by the FCC on March 31, 2016 (FCC 16-39), intended to regulate consumer privacy obligations as necessitated by the FCC's net neutrality regime.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 21 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer or enforce any of the rules proposed in the Notice of Proposed Rulemaking adopted by the FCC on March 31, 2016 (FCC 16-39), intended to regulate consumer privacy obligations as necessitated by the FCC's net neutrality regime.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 187 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 187 (Roll no. 372).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
